description: Four golden British Shorthair cats are lined up, intently looking into a wooden box containing three small kittens (one ginger, two dark brown) sleeping on a white mat.
The four adult golden British Shorthair cats are still observing the three kittens, who are huddled together in the wooden box.
One adult golden British Shorthair cat is now lying inside the wooden box, nursing the three kittens, while the other three adult cats watch from outside the box.
The three kittens are sleeping soundly in a small wooden swing bed with a yellow and white striped blanket, while an adult golden British Shorthair cat stands nearby, observing them.

A person's hands gently hold a tiny, light ginger kitten, which is meowing or yawning with its mouth open, showing its small pink tongue. Another dark kitten is visible in the background in the wooden box.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are perfectly aligned in a row on a grey sofa, all in a "loaf" position with paws tucked in.
A single golden British Shorthair cat on a grey sofa looks up with wide, curious green eyes as a human hand gently pets its head.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits on a grey chair in a "loaf" position, looking down with a slightly dejected expression.
A golden British Shorthair cat on the grey sofa stretches one front paw forward while tucking the other, maintaining a somewhat displeased look.
Another golden British Shorthair cat on a grey chair mimics the pose, with one paw extended and a similar expression.
Two, then three golden British Shorthair cats are seen in a "loaf" position on the grey sofa, looking downcast.
A golden British Shorthair cat lies on its back on the sofa, exposing its belly and paws, as a human hand gently rubs its stomach. The cat appears relaxed.
The same golden British Shorthair cat on the sofa pulls its front paw away from a human hand, looking away with a slightly annoyed expression.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits attentively on a cat scratching board, watching a human open a bag of treats.
A close-up shows a human eating a small fish treat from the bag, while the cat watches from the side.
The golden British Shorthair cat sits by the opened treat bag, looking up with a confused or slightly upset expression.
A golden British Shorthair cat eats from a light blue bowl on a wooden floor, with a bag of cat food next to it.
A human hand quickly picks up the cat's food bowl while the cat is still eating, startling it.
The golden British Shorthair cat looks up, startled and displeased, at the now empty spot where its food bowl was, its mouth slightly open.
The golden British Shorthair cat is tightly curled into a "loaf" position on the grey sofa, looking extremely grumpy and unhappy with flattened ears.
A human hand attempts to pet the grumpy cat on the sofa, but the cat flinches and pulls away, shaking its head slightly to avoid the touch.
The human hand attempts to touch the cat again, but the cat maintains its tight "loaf" posture, looking away and refusing interaction.
Three golden British Shorthair cats are lined up on the grey sofa in the "loaf" position, all looking visibly annoyed.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are perfectly lined up on the grey sofa, all in the "loaf" position, appearing very grumpy and displeased.

Four golden British Shorthair cats are gathered around a miniature mahjong table, which has mahjong tiles on its green surface. A yellow plate with dried fish is on the floor in front of one of the cats.

The camera shows a wider view of the four golden British Shorthair cats around the mahjong table. The dried fish are still on the yellow plate, and a stack of cat food cans is visible next to another cat. A blue cat playpen is in the background.
A close-up shot of one golden British Shorthair cat positioned behind the mahjong table, intently looking at the scattered mahjong tiles. Its eyes are wide and focused, showing a serious expression.

A wide shot shows a bedroom with a large bed covered in a pink bedspread. Seven golden British Shorthair cats and one calico cat are scattered across the bed, mostly lying down. An air conditioner is mounted on the wall above the bed. The camera then pans down to show a set of grey and green pet stairs next to the bed.
A close-up shot of a hand holding a large yellow box, a disposable coffee cup with a lid, and a yellow portable power bank.

A close-up of a golden British Shorthair cat sleeping soundly on the pink bed. A person's hand gently pokes its head to wake it up. The cat then rolls onto its back and playfully interacts with the hand.

A close-up of a golden British Shorthair cat wearing a blue button-up shirt and a small denim hat. A person is holding the cat and moving its paws as if it's dancing and then as if it's playing a miniature ukulele.
The dressed golden British Shorthair cat is still being held by the person, who continues to move its paws rhythmically, making it appear to dance.

A wider shot shows the person sitting on a white sofa, holding the dressed cat. Three other golden British Shorthair cats are sitting on the floor in front of the sofa, attentively watching the person and the dressed cat. Another cat is visible on a white armchair in the background. The person then gently places the dressed cat down on their lap.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are neatly aligned on a white sofa, their gaze fixed on a human hand spinning a colorful fidget spinner on a large cardboard box placed on the floor below them.
The four golden British Shorthair cats continue to watch the fidget spinner intently as it slowly comes to a stop on the cardboard box.
A human hand intervenes, stopping the fidget spinner on the box and immediately re-spinning it, while the four cats maintain their focused observation.
Close-up of a person mimicking licking the rear of a golden British Shorthair cat lying on a pink mat.
A person gently strokes the head of a golden British Shorthair cat standing on a white carpet.
A person attempts to 'lick' a golden British Shorthair cat on a white table using a fake tongue. The cat eyes the fake tongue curiously.
Three golden British Shorthair cats are lined up on a white mat, appearing indifferent. A fake tongue lies discarded nearby.
A person holds a clear plastic cover and inserts a realistic purple fake tongue, demonstrating a new method.
Overhead shot of a golden British Shorthair cat on a white table, as a person prepares to hold its tail.
A person again mimics licking the rear of the golden British Shorthair cat on the table, holding its tail.
The golden British Shorthair cat stares ahead from the table, appearing annoyed, while the person continues the action behind it.
The golden British Shorthair cat hisses and bares its teeth, clearly agitated by the person's interaction.
A person performs the 'tail-licking' action on a line of three golden British Shorthair cats on a white table.
A golden British Shorthair cat nuzzles a person's face while they are looking at a phone, then puts a paw on the phone.
A golden British Shorthair cat rubs its head affectionately against a person's hand on the floor.
A Ragdoll cat hisses at a person's hand offering a pink treat.
The Ragdoll cat lies on its back, swatting aggressively at the person's hand.
The Ragdoll cat on a white table glares and bats away a person's hand.
The Ragdoll cat continues to swat aggressively at the person's hand on the table.
A Ragdoll cat confidently walks towards the camera on a wooden floor, while a person holds out a treat.
A large, striped American Shorthair cat sits calmly on a white table, looking at the camera.
A person holds the tail of the striped American Shorthair cat and mimics licking its rear. The cat remains still, looking away.
The striped American Shorthair cat vigorously rubs its rear on a white rug, looking disgusted after the interaction.
The striped American Shorthair cat sits on the rug, looking at the camera with a defeated or annoyed expression.

Four golden British Shorthair cats are seated in pairs on two light-colored chairs in a living room. The two cats on the left chair are looking forward, as are the two on the right chair. A cat tree and a sofa are visible in the background.
The four golden British Shorthair cats remain seated in pairs on the two chairs. All of their heads are now lowered, looking downwards.

A close-up view of two golden British Shorthair cats sitting side-by-side on one chair. Both cats have their heads lowered. A person's hand reaches into the frame and gently pokes the cat on the right. The cat briefly lifts its head, then lowers it again.
A close-up of one golden British Shorthair cat sitting on a chair with its head initially lowered. The cat then slightly lifts its head and looks to the left, away from the camera.
A wider shot showing all four golden British Shorthair cats again, seated in pairs on the two chairs, similar to Scene 2. All four cats have their heads lowered, looking downwards.

A wide shot of a bed covered with a pink striped duvet, occupied by a large group of cats. There are at least eight cats of various breeds and colors, predominantly golden British Shorthairs and one black tabby cat, relaxing on the bed.
The camera pans slightly to the right, revealing a person lying asleep on a narrow mat positioned on a bay window seat. Several cats remain on the bed to the left of the frame.

A person is inside a large, transparent, pop-up mesh tent or enclosure, seated on a white mat covered with loose cat hair. They are using a brush to groom a golden British Shorthair cat. Two other golden cats watch from a white low-standing cabinet next to the tent.
A close-up shot shows four golden British Shorthair cats lying in a neat row on a light-colored rug. A hand holding a white grooming brush moves over one of the cats.

A wide view of a living room. A person is sitting inside a large, white wire-grid cube enclosure, working on a laptop. A black tabby cat sits outside the cage, looking at the person. Several golden cats are scattered on the wooden floor around the enclosure, and one is in a green avocado-shaped cat bed.

The camera slightly widens its view, revealing more cats in the living room. Two white cats are now visible lying on the wooden floor, adding to the multitude of cats surrounding the person in the cage.

A close-up of the white wire-grid cage. Four golden British Shorthair cats are seated close together outside the cage, looking intently at the person inside. A white cat stands on its hind legs, reaching up the cage bars, also looking inside.

A person is kneeling on the floor, completely covered by a large, transparent plastic sheet, creating a makeshift protective barrier. Four golden British Shorthair cats are lined up in front of them, looking up at the person.
A closer shot of the person in the plastic sheet. They lean down to try and kiss a golden cat they are holding. The cat looks surprised and a bit uncertain.
The person attempts to kiss the cat again. The cat quickly dodges the kiss and then looks directly at the camera with wide, expressive eyes.
The golden cat is resting on the person's lap, still covered by the plastic sheet. The cat stares at the camera with a curious, slightly puzzled expression.
A close-up of a person lying asleep on a pink bed, wearing a clear, half-face mask. A white sock, resembling a cat's paw, gently presses against the mask.
A low-angle shot from the perspective of looking up at four golden British Shorthair cats. Their faces fill the frame as they look directly down at the camera, their round eyes prominent.
A person is sleeping on the bed, wearing the clear face mask. Four golden British Shorthair cats are positioned around their head, looking at the person.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits on the pillow next to the sleeping person's head. The cat uses its paw to gently try and push the clear face mask off the person's face.
A golden cat is lying directly on top of the sleeping person's face, completely covering the clear mask with its body.
A black tabby cat is perched on the sleeping person's chest. The person, still wearing the mask, reaches up to gently push the cat away from them.
A black tabby cat lies on its back on the pink bedsheet, stretching its paws towards the camera. The bedsheet is covered with scattered clumps of cat fur.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits upright on the pink bedsheet, which is visibly covered with numerous tufts of loose cat hair. The cat looks directly at the camera.

A person is lying on a bed that is completely covered with black spike mats, designed to deter cats. Four golden British Shorthair cats are sitting on the grey headboard of the bed, observing the person.
The person is still lying on the spike mats, looking at their phone. A golden British Shorthair cat is sitting on the bedside table next to the bed, looking towards the person.
Three golden British Shorthair cats are visible behind white wire-grid panels, looking up with curious expressions.

A wide shot of the bedroom shows the entire bed enclosed within a tall, white wire-grid cage structure. The person is inside the cage, lying on the bed. Several cats are outside the cage, on the wooden floor.
The camera pans down to show four golden British Shorthair cats lined up on the wooden floor outside the cage, all looking up at the bed with questioning expressions.
A golden British Shorthair cat is seen close-up, looking up at the wire-grid cage with a puzzled expression. Another cat is partially visible in the background.
A close-up of a golden British Shorthair cat sitting on the wooden floor, looking directly at the camera with wide, innocent eyes.
A golden British Shorthair cat stands on its hind legs, using its front paws to stretch up against the white wire-grid cage, attempting to reach the bed.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are lined up side-by-side on the wooden floor, pressing against the wire-grid cage, all looking up at the bed. The front cat is actively reaching up the cage.

A person wearing a brown jacket pets four golden British Shorthair cats lying in a perfect row on a light blue bed. The cats are facing the camera. The person then stands up and walks away from the bed, out of frame.
The four golden British Shorthair cats remain lying in a perfect row on the light blue bed, looking attentively in the direction the person left.
The four golden British Shorthair cats subtly inch forward together in their perfect line on the bed, maintaining their formation. One of the cats yawns.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits on a bed, batting at a laptop screen which then glitches and shows vertical lines.
An overhead security camera view shows three golden British Shorthair cats in a living room. One cat jumps and knocks a large, flat-screen television to the floor.
A golden British Shorthair cat is seen on a kitchen counter near a vase with red flowers. The cat bats at the vase, knocking it off the counter.
The broken pieces of the white vase and scattered red flowers are visible on the grey tiled kitchen floor.
Two identical golden British Shorthair cats sit side by side on a white rug, looking at the camera.
A golden British Shorthair cat is next to an open laptop displaying a cartoon. The cat appears to scratch or bite the screen, causing it to glitch with colorful vertical lines.
A close-up shows a golden British Shorthair cat aggressively biting and chewing on a white charging cable held by a person's hand.
The golden British Shorthair cat sits on a light wooden floor, with a long, tangled white cable around it, looking somewhat bewildered.
A close-up of the golden British Shorthair cat's face shows it looking annoyed, as a person's hand gently strokes its chin and cheek.
A golden British Shorthair cat is eating from a silver food bowl. It suddenly headbutts the bowl, causing cat food to spill out.
Scattered cat food kibble is spread across the light wooden floor, with the golden British Shorthair cat sitting a short distance away, looking innocently at the mess.
A person's hands gently push the golden British Shorthair cat towards the scattered food near an automatic cat feeder, as if trying to make it pick up the food. The cat resists.
A person's hands gently roll the golden British Shorthair cat on its back and side on the wooden floor, amidst the scattered cat food, in a playful but disciplinary manner.
A cardboard cutout shaped like a sleeping cat with a separate fish shape above it is shown on the wooden floor.
A golden British Shorthair cat's head is poking through the neck opening of the cardboard cat cutout, while a person holds the cardboard fish shape above its head.
The person gently adjusts the cardboard cat cutout around the golden British Shorthair cat, which is fully inside the cutout, looking out with wide eyes.
The golden British Shorthair cat, still in the cardboard cutout, lets out a loud, drawn-out meow.
The golden British Shorthair cat looks sad and downcast, with its head poking through a slightly bent and broken cardboard cat cutout, as a person points a finger at it.
A golden British Shorthair cat is shown rummaging through a small, black, knocked-over trash can, with contents spilled on the white rug.
A close-up shows a person's hand petting the golden British Shorthair cat's head, which is next to the knocked-over trash can. The cat looks away.
Two identical golden British Shorthair cats are seen with their heads poking through a double-cat cardboard cutout, facing forward.
A person places a cardboard fish shape onto the double cat cutout while the two golden British Shorthair cats are inside, looking out.
The person gently adjusts the double cardboard cat cutout, causing the two golden British Shorthair cats inside to look at the camera with wide, innocent eyes.
A person holds a tablet playing a drumming video on a bed, as a golden British Shorthair kitten approaches to watch.
The first kitten sits intently, watching the drumming video on the tablet.
Two golden British Shorthair kittens are now captivated, watching the drumming video on the tablet.
Three golden British Shorthair kittens are lined up, watching the drumming video on the tablet.
Four golden British Shorthair kittens are gathered, with three watching the tablet and one (on a pillow) looking confused.
A close-up shows the puzzled kitten sitting on the pillow.
A kitten vigorously licks the hair of a man sleeping in bed.
A closer view of the kitten persistently licking the man's hair.
A close-up reveals a small bald spot on the man's scalp, presumably from the kitten's licking.
A person holds the kitten while trying to give it catnip water from a glass using a cotton swab. The kitten resists.
A small kitten sits on a white couch, being lovingly licked by two larger golden British Shorthair cats.
Four adult cats (two golden, one black striped, one white/brown) surround and lick the small kitten on the white couch.
The overwhelmed kitten is persistently licked by the four adult cats.
A close-up shows the kitten with wet, spiky fur on its head, looking sad and disheveled.
A golden British Shorthair cat is lying on a white table, looking down, while a person's hands are in the foreground, using tweezers to adjust a small black and white felt panda.
A close-up shot of five small black and white felt pandas arranged on a white table. A golden British Shorthair cat is visible in the background.
Three golden British Shorthair cats are lying on a carpet, attentively watching a tablet that displays a video of pandas.
A person's hand points to images of brown and white pandas displayed on a tablet screen, while the cats are still watching.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are lined up on a white carpet, all looking at the tablet screen.
A person's hand gently taps the head of a small golden British Shorthair kitten sitting on a white sofa next to a larger, adult golden British Shorthair cat.
The person's hand pulls loose fur from the larger golden British Shorthair cat's head.
The person's hand reaches out to the paw of the small kitten, which recoils slightly.
The person's hand reaches out to the paw of the larger cat, which pulls its paw away.
Both golden British Shorthair cats are lying on the white sofa, looking away, appearing disgruntled.
A person's hands rub together, then gather a pile of golden-brown cat fur. A golden British Shorthair cat is lying on a white blanket in the background.
The person's hands begin to felt the collected cat fur using a needle tool on a white foam block, as the cat observes the process.
The person continues to felt the cat fur into a shape, with the cat watching intently.
A closer view of the person felting the cat fur, with the cat observing in the background.
The person adds eyes and other details to the felted panda figure.
The person holds up the completed felted brown panda figure.
The person holds the felted brown panda figure up to the golden British Shorthair cat, which sniffs the toy.
The cat gently rubs its head against the felted brown panda figure.
The cat sniffs the felted brown panda figure again, looking curious.

The person holds the new brown felt panda toy on a white table, surrounded by the previously made black and white felt pandas, while the golden British Shorthair cat sits above them, gazing at the new creation.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are lying in a row on a light-colored rug, attentively watching a panda video playing on a tablet in front of them.
One of the golden British Shorthair cats approaches the tablet and gently rubs its face against the screen, interacting with the panda's image.
The four golden British Shorthair cats are lined up again, observing the tablet, which now displays an upside-down image of the panda, causing the cats to look perplexed.
A black tabby cat and a white and brown ragdoll cat are sitting side-by-side on a wooden floor, looking towards the camera.
The four golden British Shorthair cats look more interested as they watch the tablet again.
A golden British Shorthair cat is positioned inside a small cardboard box, peeking out, next to a larger cardboard box lined with green, soft bristles.
A fluffy white and brown ragdoll cat quickly passes through the bristled box, leaving behind a noticeable pile of collected fur. Two golden British Shorthair cats observe.
The ragdoll cat exits the box, shaking off residual fur as the two golden British Shorthair cats continue to watch.
A black tabby cat approaches and enters the bristled box.
The black tabby cat is shown struggling to push its way through the bristled box, its back end wiggling with effort.
A pair of hands rub together, then begin working with small white felt pieces, preparing them. A golden British Shorthair cat watches from above.
Close-up of hands needle-felting small white felt balls, while the golden British Shorthair cat observes the process intently.
The golden British Shorthair cat, looking impatient, repeatedly taps a human hand with its paw.
A small white table displays several panda plush toys of varying sizes, black and white, and brown and white. A hand points to one of the plush toys.
The golden British Shorthair cat approaches the table and sniffs the panda plush toys.
A white tote bag shaped like a panda with a zippered mouth opening sits on the floor next to a golden British Shorthair cat.
Three golden British Shorthair cats sit in a line on the wooden floor, attentively looking at the panda tote bag. One cat is already inside the bag.
A golden British Shorthair cat gracefully leaps into the panda tote bag, as two other golden British Shorthair cats watch from nearby.
A close-up shows the golden British Shorthair cat's face peeking out from the panda tote bag's mouth opening.
Hands are seen needle-felting a small panda figure, adding black features. The golden British Shorthair cat continues to watch from the background.
A hand holds up a completed, small needle-felted panda figurine, showcasing its detailed design.

Numerous small, needle-felted panda figurines in various poses, some with tiny red apple accessories, are meticulously arranged on a white circular table. A golden British Shorthair cat sits majestically behind them.
The golden British Shorthair cat sits amongst the array of panda figurines on the table, licking its lips with satisfaction.
The golden British Shorthair cat poses proudly on the table, surrounded by a large collection of panda plush toys and small panda figurines.
The black tabby cat and the white and brown ragdoll cat stare at the table covered with panda items, their expressions conveying bewilderment.
Close-up of a cat's fluffy white paws, each wearing a small, light brown, wool-like boot with a blue bow detail, as the cat lies on a checkered brown and white rug.
Four golden British Shorthair kittens are seen sitting in a row on a white sofa, with three large cat-shaped pillows behind them. One kitten on the right wears small boots on its paws.
A hand holds up a pair of small, light brown, wool-like cat boots with blue bows against a checkered rug.
Four golden British Shorthair kittens are lined up on a white sofa, looking towards the camera.
A close-up shows a person's hand gently patting the head of a golden British Shorthair cat lying on the white sofa.
A person's hand strokes the back of a golden British Shorthair cat, seemingly collecting loose fur. The cat looks slightly annoyed.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits on the sofa, looking sad as a hand strokes its back.
A hand holds a small, grey, fluffy wig in front of a golden British Shorthair cat, which looks curious.
A close-up shows the golden British Shorthair cat wearing the grey wig, looking displeased.
Two golden British Shorthair cats are seen side-by-side on the sofa, both wearing small grey wigs and looking grumpy.
A close-up of a person's hands working with a clump of light brown cat fur and a piece of brown felted material on a green cutting mat.
A person's hands are shown placing mesh over cat fur, spraying it with water, and rubbing it on a green cutting mat. A golden British Shorthair cat watches nearby.
A close-up shows a person's hands continuing to rub the cat fur under the mesh, with the golden British Shorthair cat observing.
A hand holds up a finished pair of light brown, wool-like cat boots with white bows.
Three pairs of small, handmade, wool-like cat boots with different colored bows (green, teddy bear faces, blue) are displayed on a white sofa.
Close-up of two cats' paws, each wearing a pair of light brown, wool-like boots with white and green bows, as they lie on a checkered rug.
Close-up of three cats' paws, each wearing a pair of light brown, wool-like boots with white, green, and blue bows, on a checkered rug.
A person's hand holds a golden British Shorthair cat's paw, with two small, light brown boots with teddy bear faces lying next to it, indicating they are too small.
A close-up of a golden British Shorthair cat sitting on a person's lap, looking increasingly annoyed and closing its eyes in frustration.
A golden British Shorthair cat is inside a large, colorful Chupa Chups lollipop box, actively chewing on an unseen object within. Shredded paper pieces are scattered around the box.
The golden British Shorthair cat lies on a light-colored wooden floor, chewing on a black cylindrical object, holding it with its paws.
A human hand holds up a circular, chewed-up cork coaster, while the golden British Shorthair cat looks on from the background, with small cork pieces scattered on the floor.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are neatly lined up on a light-colored rug. A human hand holds a tablet displaying various cat-shaped felt coaster designs in front of them.
A human hand gently strokes the backs of five golden British Shorthair cats lined up on a white rug, with a small ball of light brown fur visible on the rug.
A close-up of a golden British Shorthair cat, looking up at a human hand as it is being petted.
A close-up of another golden British Shorthair cat, its green eyes widening as a human hand pulls a small amount of fur from its back.
The golden British Shorthair cat lowers its head, appearing dejected or annoyed after its fur was pulled.
Human hands are seen using a needle felting tool to shape a round piece of light brown cat fur on a white surface.
A human hand proudly displays a finished, round, light brown felt piece, resembling a coaster.
A golden British Shorthair cat attempts to lick or 'drink' from a small, cat-shaped felt cup sitting on a white table. The cup is also made from light brown fur.
A human hand holds up the cat-shaped felt cup, revealing its intricate details: a cat's face and paws, a black tail forming the handle, and a white and black design inside resembling latte art.
The cat-shaped felt cup is placed on a white table next to the golden British Shorthair cat, as the human hand continues to present it.
The golden British Shorthair cat looks surprised, then opens its mouth wide, appearing to vocalize loudly.
The golden British Shorthair cat observes as a human hand uses a black marker to draw the outline of a sleeping cat on the light brown felt circle.
A large, fluffy white Ragdoll cat is stretched out on a white cabinet. A human hand reaches towards it.
The human hand gently pulls a small amount of fur from the white Ragdoll cat, which reacts with a vocalization.
The white Ragdoll cat opens its mouth and hisses or growls at the human hand, showing aggression.
The white Ragdoll cat is now calmly resting on the cabinet, looking at the human hand.
A close-up shows a person's black clothing heavily covered with white cat fur.
Human hands remove a substantial clump of white and gray lint and fur from the lint trap of a clothes dryer.
Close-up of human hands using a needle felting tool to add detailed features like eyes, nose, stripes, and a small black paw to the cat outline on the light brown felt circle.

A human hand holds up a finished felt coaster, which features a detailed depiction of a sleeping golden cat curled within the embrace of a white and black cat. A golden British Shorthair cat in the background looks on.
The golden British Shorthair cat approaches and sniffs the cat-shaped felt cup, then looks up at the human.
The golden British Shorthair cat sits next to the cat-shaped felt cup, looking dejected or concerned.

The golden British Shorthair cat is positioned on a white table. Below it, human hands display three finished felt coasters, each featuring a different cat pattern (black tabby, golden, and white/brown).

Three cats (a black tabby, a golden British Shorthair, and a Ragdoll) are lined up on the white table. Below them, a human holds up the three felt coasters, which perfectly match the fur patterns of the cats above.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are lying in a row on a white rug, intently watching a tablet screen that displays an image of a small, light brown rabbit next to red strawberries.
The camera zooms out slightly, revealing the full row of four golden British Shorthair cats, all with their eyes fixed on the tablet.
One golden British Shorthair cat sits upright next to the tablet, looking at the screen, as a human hand gently pets its head. The cat then vocalizes, appearing to react to the petting.
The golden British Shorthair cat is now sitting on a white marble table. A human hand holds up a twisted metal wire in front of the cat, and the cat playfully bats at the wire with its paw.

The four golden British Shorthair cats are back on the white rug, lying in a row. A human hand is seen gently plucking fur from their backs, collecting it into a small, fluffy pile in front of them. The cats appear unamused or resigned.
A close-up shot shows the collected pile of golden cat fur on the rug. Then, five golden British Shorthair cats are seen lined up, all looking somewhat grumpy, with the pile of fur in front of them.

A human uses a needle felting tool to shape a small, golden, oval piece of fur on a white foam board. The golden British Shorthair cat sits on the table, watching the process with a subtle, somber expression. The human then creates two small ear shapes from the fur.

The felted oval is placed on the foam board. The cat eyes it, then looks up at the human, appearing to vocalize its disapproval before looking down again as the two felted ears are placed next to the oval.

The human continues to felt a larger, body-shaped piece of fur. The golden British Shorthair cat intently watches from the table as the human holds up a bundle of fur, indicating more is needed for the project.
The golden British Shorthair cat looks directly up at the human with an alert expression.
The golden British Shorthair cat walks slowly on a wooden floor covered in scattered golden fur. A vacuum cleaner with a green light then moves across the floor, efficiently cleaning up the fur.
A human hand holds up a large, fluffy ball of golden cat fur, demonstrating the amount collected.
A golden British Shorthair cat is seen eating dry food from an automatic feeder, with some kibble spilled around the bowl on the floor.
The human adds more detailed features, such as the belly and legs, to the felted rabbit using a needle. The golden British Shorthair cat watches the process from the background.
Two human hands hold up the fully completed, golden, felted rabbit, showcasing the finished product.

The golden British Shorthair cat sits on a white table next to the tablet displaying the rabbit image. A human holds the newly created felted rabbit next to the tablet for comparison, and the cat stares intently at the felted rabbit.
The human attaches a small, red, fake strawberry onto the felted rabbit's paw, still in view of the golden British Shorthair cat.
The human holds the felted rabbit close to the golden British Shorthair cat's face, and the cat sniffs the rabbit.
The felted rabbit is placed on the table in front of the golden British Shorthair cat. The cat looks from the rabbit to the human, appearing to express sadness or disappointment.
Close-up of a small, grey, felted cat toy with red lips on a white carpet, with two blurred cats in the background.

Two golden British Shorthair cats are on the floor next to the bed, looking curiously at the toy gun setup. A third cat is on the windowsill.
The toy gun is aimed at a golden British Shorthair cat peeking cautiously from behind a curtain, which then retreats further behind it.
A hand reaches into a bag of cat food, pulling out a scoop.
A hand holds a spoonful of cat food. Two golden British Shorthair cats are in the background, looking attentively at the food.
A light blue bowl filled with cat kibble is placed on the pink bedsheets, with a yellow dart lying nearby. A golden British Shorthair cat approaches the bowl to eat.
First-person view from the toy gun, pointed at a golden British Shorthair cat eating from the bowl on the bed. Another cat is partially visible behind it.
The golden British Shorthair cat looks up from its food, seemingly startled, and quickly jumps off the bed.
The golden British Shorthair cat is captured mid-air, jumping gracefully over the food bowl.
The golden British Shorthair cat returns to the bowl and begins eating again. The toy gun fires multiple darts, scattering them around the bowl, causing the cat to jump off the bed once more.
The bed is now empty of cats, with yellow foam darts scattered across the pink sheets. The toy gun is visible in the foreground.
A wider shot of the bedroom shows the now empty bed and the toy gun resting on a stool at the foot of the bed.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits on the stool next to the toy gun, looking at it intently. Its eyes then glow red, suggesting it is now operating the gun.
A freeze frame close-up of the golden British Shorthair cat with glowing red eyes, sitting next to the toy gatling gun.

Four golden British Shorthair cats are lined up neatly on a gray sofa, looking forward. A hand spins a toy spinner on a pink cardboard box placed on a small wooden table in front of them. The box has sections drawn on it like a pie chart.
Three golden British Shorthair cats are now sitting on the floor in front of the pink box. A hand spins the toy spinner, and it lands on one of the sections. The cats watch intently.
A close-up shows the three golden British Shorthair cats looking directly at the viewer with serious, somewhat judgmental expressions.
A hand lifts the toy spinner from the pink box, tilting it to show it is flat underneath. In the background, the three golden British Shorthair cats are now on top of a white cabinet, observing.
The hand places the spinner back on the pink box and gives it a spin. The spinner lands on a section. The cats on the cabinet look on, appearing curious.
A person holds the first golden British Shorthair cat over the pink box and gently guides its paw to spin the toy. The cat appears reluctant and looks down as the spinner moves and eventually stops.
The first golden British Shorthair cat is seen on the white cabinet, looking forward with a defeated or sad expression.

The person holds the second golden British Shorthair cat over the pink box and guides its paw to spin the toy. This cat also appears hesitant, but its paw makes the spinner go. The spinner lands on the same section as before.
The second golden British Shorthair cat is on the white cabinet, looking directly at the viewer with an angry, annoyed expression.
A white and brown Ragdoll cat walks up to the pink box, extends a paw, and attempts to spin the toy itself, looking eager.
A close-up shows the Ragdoll cat looking at its paw. A hand approaches and gently takes the cat's paw, then presents two small, round, white objects, one by one. The cat seems mildly curious.
The Ragdoll cat sits near a cat tree. A hand scoops dry cat food from a bag into a blue, character-shaped cat bowl. The Ragdoll cat then begins to eat from the bowl.
The third golden British Shorthair cat is on the white cabinet, stretching its body.

The person holds the third golden British Shorthair cat over the pink box and guides its paw to spin the toy. The cat closes its eyes and looks extremely reluctant, trying to pull its paw away as the spinner lands on a section.
The third golden British Shorthair cat is on the floor, looking directly at the viewer with wide, innocent, and seemingly shocked eyes. It then looks slightly to the side.

A fluffy gray cat attempts to squeeze through a transparent plastic tube on a pink striped bed. Its head is already through, but its body struggles to follow, appearing compressed within the narrow space.

Three golden British Shorthair cats, all fluffy and similar in appearance, are sitting in a neat row on a pink striped bed. Two transparent plastic tubes of different diameters are placed in front of them, suggesting an upcoming challenge.

A human hand places a small can of wet cat food (Fancy Feast brand) at the end of the wider transparent tube on the bed. One of the golden British Shorthair cats approaches the tube, showing curiosity.

A close-up shows a golden British Shorthair cat sniffing the can of cat food placed inside the wider tube. Its head is slightly inserted into the tube as it tries to reach the food. A hand gently pets the cat's head.

One of the golden British Shorthair cats (identified as "Laoda") stands at the entrance of the wider tube, looking at the cat food can placed within. The other two cats watch from the background on the bed.

"Laoda" attempts to "cheat" the challenge by reaching for the food from the side of the tube, instead of entering it. A human hand intervenes, stopping the cat from cheating, and gently pets its head. The cat appears disappointed.

The second golden British Shorthair cat (identified as "Lao Er") is presented with the empty wider transparent tube. The cat appears uninterested in the challenge and does not attempt to go through it.
To encourage "Lao Er," two human hands place three different cans of wet cat food, seemingly increasing the appeal, at the end of the wider tube.
"Lao Er" slowly and carefully begins to enter the wider tube, head first, moving towards the multiple cans of food. Its head and front paws are inside the tube as it starts eating.
"Lao Er" successfully navigates through the entire length of the wider tube and continues to enjoy eating from the cat food cans at the end.
"Lao Er" is seen relaxing comfortably on a pink pillow, being petted by a human hand, while another golden British Shorthair cat watches from the side, awaiting its turn.

A long, flat Advent calendar-like box, with multiple compartments, is laid out on the bed. Several cans of cat food are visible at the far end of the box, indicating a larger reward for a successful challenge.

A human hand opens one of the compartments on the Advent calendar, revealing a small can of cat food. The golden British Shorthair cat (identified as "Xiaosan") watches intently as the can is picked up and offered to it.
"Xiaosan" is positioned at the start of the narrower transparent tube. A human hand encourages the cat to enter. The cat lowers its head and begins to crawl into the tube, wiggling its body forward.
A close-up shot from inside the tube shows "Xiaosan"'s face and front paws as it slowly tries to push its way through the narrow space.
"Xiaosan" becomes stuck halfway through the narrower tube, unable to move forward or backward. Its body appears visibly compressed and struggles within the tube.
"Xiaosan" is finally pulled free from the tube by the human hand, looking slightly disoriented or annoyed by the experience. It shakes its head.
The video concludes with "Xiaosan" sitting in front of the empty tube, looking at it and then towards the camera, seemingly pondering the challenge. A brief static screen appears at the very end.
A golden British Shorthair cat is sitting uncomfortably on a white mat inside a yellow and black mesh enclosure, looking down.

Five cats (two golden British Shorthairs, one black, one tabby, one calico) are lined up behind a white baby gate, watching intently.

The human adds liquid and drops from a syringe into the blue bowl, mixing the mother cat's meal.

A silver/grey cat observes a person's hands moving three white paper cups with drawn faces on a light-colored floor.

A golden British Shorthair cat sits on a wooden floor, observing a person's hands rapidly shuffling three purple paper cups. The cat then nudges and chooses one cup. The hand lifts the cup to reveal a treat underneath.

A third golden British Shorthair cat lies in a round cardboard bed, observing as a person's hands prepare the three purple cups for the game. The cat then approaches the cups with determination.

An adult golden British Shorthair cat sits on a green mat next to a small wooden bed where a golden British Shorthair kitten is sleeping under a bear-patterned blanket. A human hand enters the frame from the right, holding a stack of pink banknotes and begins to count them in front of the cats.

Two golden British Shorthair cats observe a giant, fluffy, brown oval-shaped cat bed leaning vertically against a white wall in a hallway. Another cat is seen further down the hallway in the background.

The kitten successfully pulls its head back from the bars and looks around with a slightly dazed or relieved expression.

Four golden British Shorthair cats are lying in a neat row on a bed, focused on an animated video playing on a tablet placed in front of them.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are stacked vertically, each occupying a different level of a white rolling storage cart.

A person holds a golden British Shorthair cat with bright green eyes and a serious, slightly grumpy expression. The cat's front paws dangle as it is held up, looking directly at the camera. A large, designated area on the floor is covered with light-colored sand or cat litter. A single golden British Shorthair cat walks into the frame, observing the vast litter area with a curious expression.
Four golden British Shorthair cats gather around and eat from a very large, shallow, round metal bowl overflowing with cat food.

Five golden British Shorthair cats sit in a line, gazing intently at two large glass fish tanks filled with various fish. A cat figurine with wings sits atop one of the tanks.

A person holds a golden British Shorthair cat and walks towards an open bathroom door, where three identical golden British Shorthair cats are sitting in a neat line, looking attentively at the bathroom. The person enters the bathroom with the cat.

A person's hands perform a shell game with three white cups on a white floor, while a silver-grey cat intently watches the cups.
Three golden British Shorthair cats are lying in a neat row on a grey couch, each on a small mat, looking towards the camera.

On a wooden floor, a person's hands rapidly move three orange plastic bowls in a shell game, with a golden British Shorthair cat closely following the movements. Another golden British Shorthair cat is visible in the background, resting in a scratching box.

A human hand points at a miniature pink hamster wheel (labeled "treadmill") placed on the table in front of the cat. The cat looks at the tiny wheel.

A close-up shot from inside the fridge shows the face of a golden British Shorthair cat with wide, curious green eyes peering into the camera. The cat licks its lips.
The golden British Shorthair cat lies on the floor next to the open fridge, looking away from the owner, with a piece of raw chicken on the floor nearby.
A close-up of the golden British Shorthair cat's face as the owner's hand gently pets its head. The cat appears to be in mid-meow or a defiant expression.
Three bowls containing pungent foods—a durian fruit, stinky tofu, and a bowl of Luosifen (snail noodles)—are arranged on a clear glass table.
The owner carefully places the three bowls of pungent food from Scene 8 into the refrigerator, positioning them near the small security camera.
A close-up shot from inside the fridge shows the golden British Shorthair cat's face appearing again. The cat sniffs the air with a slightly surprised expression.
The cat's eyes widen further, reacting to the smell, and it quickly pulls its head back from the fridge opening.
The golden British Shorthair cat is shown with its head inside an open toilet bowl, appearing to gag or retch. The owner's hand gently pats the cat's back.
The same golden British Shorthair cat is lying on a wooden floor, with its face buried, appearing upset. The owner's hand pets its head.
A light blue cat-shaped food bowl sits next to a large bag of cat food.
Close-up of a bowl of Luosifen. Chopsticks lift a tangle of noodles from the broth.
A close-up of a person's nose and mouth, scrunching up in distaste after sniffing the Luosifen.
The golden British Shorthair cat sits on a clear glass table with a brown and white checkered pattern beneath it. The cat looks at the camera with wide, confused green eyes.
A close-up of the cat's face from Scene 17, its green eyes large and pupils dilated, maintaining a confused expression.
The cat opens its mouth wide, appearing to gag or retch while sitting on the table.

A golden British Shorthair cat is perched inside a light green litter box filled with yellow litter. A hand holds a clear plastic cup and a metal scooper containing yellow, lumpy objects resembling cat waste, which are deposited into the cup. The cat observes the action with a curious and slightly confused expression, turning its head to watch.

A wider shot reveals a mock "cat coffee shop" setup. One golden British Shorthair cat is inside the light green litter box, appearing to "prepare" drinks by digging in the yellow litter. Another golden British Shorthair cat sits patiently next to a white box that holds three clear plastic cups, seemingly waiting in line for a drink. The "coffee shop" features a wooden frame structure with decorative banners.

A close-up of the three clear plastic cups, which are filled with dark pellets at the bottom and topped with the yellow, lumpy material. A hand reaches in and picks up one of the cups, which has a white straw inserted into it.
A top-down view shows the contents of the chosen plastic cup with the white straw. The straw is moved as if to take a sip, but then quickly pulls away, conveying a sense of aversion or disgust.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are lined up on a white couch, with a small, cat-shaped felt doll placed in front of the middle cat.

The cat extends its paw to push the small cat-shaped doll, then looks up with a seemingly annoyed expression.
A hand holds a clear container with four larger, unfinished felt cat heads and a spool of wire, while three real cats observe from the background.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are neatly lined up on a white couch, looking forward with curious expressions.
A hand gently combs or pulls fur from the back of one of the golden British Shorthair cats.
Close-up of the cat's face as it looks at the camera with wide, round eyes.
The hand continues to gently pull fur from the cat's back.
A finger gently pokes the cat's paw, and the cat flinches slightly.
The cat looks away with an expression of annoyance or anger.
The cat is shown looking down, appearing upset.
A person's hands are seen using a needle felting tool to create a small cat-shaped figure, with a real golden British Shorthair cat observing in the background.
The golden British Shorthair cat looks at the camera with wide eyes as a hand displays a small, finished felt cat and a pile of collected fur.
A white robotic vacuum cleaner moves across a light-colored wooden floor, sweeping up scattered cat fur.
A hand opens the dustbin of the robotic vacuum cleaner and pulls out a large clump of collected cat fur.
The robotic vacuum cleaner is shown in its charging station, then moving across the floor, demonstrating its cleaning functions and ability to lift its mop pads and clean along edges.
A hand holds up a small, standing felt cat doll with a golden body and a small bow.
Three felt cat dolls are arranged on the white couch in different poses: one holding a fish, one crouching, and one sitting upright.
Four felt cat dolls are displayed inside a clear glass case, while two real cats are visible in the background looking at the display.
The four real golden British Shorthair cats are lined up on the white couch, each with a corresponding, equally sized felt cat doll in front of them, appearing content.
A person carefully applies ointment to the nose area of a golden British Shorthair cat lying relaxed on their lap.
The golden British Shorthair cat looks up at the person's hand, reacting to the ointment application.
A person uses a spoon to scoop out the red flesh from a small, hollowed-out watermelon half, observed by the golden British Shorthair cat on a wooden table.
The person presents the empty watermelon rind to the golden British Shorthair cat, which looks at it curiously.
The person trims the edges of the watermelon rind with a knife on a green cutting board, the golden British Shorthair cat watching.

The person places the watermelon rind hat on the golden British Shorthair cat's head and ties the elastic string under its chin.

Close-up of the golden British Shorthair cat with the watermelon hat, maintaining a serious, unimpressed expression.
The golden British Shorthair cat, still in the watermelon hat, turns its head to look around from the chair.
Close-up of the cat looking directly at the camera with a noticeably unamused expression.
The golden British Shorthair cat climbs onto a small wooden stool and attempts to eat from a fresh half of watermelon.

The person continues to pet the cat as it persists in trying to eat the watermelon, despite the hair.
The golden British Shorthair cat is back on the chair with its watermelon hat, as a hand holds up the second empty watermelon rind.

Both cats are seen on a cat tree, each wearing a watermelon hat, displaying expressions of unamusement or resignation.

Two large, knitted Christmas cat houses (one shaped like a Christmas tree, one like a gift box) are on the floor. A golden British Shorthair cat emerges from behind smaller, matching knitted items in the foreground.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits on the floor, looking at miniature knitted Christmas tree and gift box cat toys.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are lying on a rug, attentively watching a tablet displaying various knitted Christmas tree designs.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are lined up, looking up with anticipation.
Two golden British Shorthair cats are sitting on a blue star-patterned blanket, observing crafting materials (pipe cleaners, pink paper) on a white surface.
A hand gently "plucks" fur from a golden British Shorthair cat sitting on the blue blanket. The cat looks surprised, with small brown pom-poms and cat fur visible nearby.
The golden cat bats the hand away. Two golden cats sit side-by-side on the blanket, looking displeased.
Two golden cats on the blanket watch as a hand holds a pink paper cone, the base for a Christmas tree craft.
A hand uses scissors to cut brown pipe cleaners and then glues the cut pieces onto the pink cone. A golden cat watches from the side.
The hand continues to layer brown and lighter-colored pipe cleaners onto the cone, creating a tiered Christmas tree shape, with a golden cat observing in the background.
A hand points at the golden cat's front paws, which are tucked underneath its body as it lies on the blanket.
A person holds a golden cat and wipes its backside, then its face, with a tissue. The cat appears annoyed.
Close-up of hands decorating the knitted brown and cream Christmas tree with small red pom-poms and a white ribbon bow. A blurred golden cat is in the background.
Hands proudly present the fully decorated miniature knitted Christmas tree.
A golden British Shorthair cat licks the top pom-pom of the miniature knitted brown and cream Christmas tree held by a hand.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits on a white table, surrounded by five different colored and decorated miniature knitted Christmas trees.

The person pulls back from the cat, showing a disgusted expression, while still holding the cat upside down. The cat maintains its displeased look.
The person makes another attempt to kiss the cat, but the cat actively tries to evade it.

From a wider perspective, the person is seen sitting on a white sofa, holding the cat. Two more golden British Shorthair cats are on the floor looking up, and another cat rests on the sofa. The person continues to try and kiss the cat they are holding.
The person attempts to offer a treat stick to the cat in their arms, but the cat shows no interest in eating it.
The person is lying unconscious on the floor next to an empty drink can. The three golden British Shorthair cats are gathered and observing the person intently.
Two golden British Shorthair cats are now resting on the unconscious person's body; one on their head/neck and another on their abdomen.
The person crawls into a large, yellow metal pet cage to sleep. A golden British Shorthair cat is already inside the cage, while another watches from outside.
The person is seen sleeping curled up inside the pet cage. A golden British Shorthair cat sits beside them, looking on.
A person’s hand uses a squeegee to wipe condensed water off a smooth, white tiled wall.
A golden British Shorthair cat is seen from above, lying on a light-colored tiled floor, licking water off the base of a wet white wall.
Three golden British Shorthair cats are gathered closely in a corner of a room, all licking condensed water off the white tiled wall.
Three golden British Shorthair cats are lined up on the floor, all licking water off a reflective black surface, possibly a refrigerator door, with their reflections visible.
Three golden British Shorthair cats are lined up, licking condensed water off a glass door.
A white cat is on the floor, licking condensed water off the side of a grey cabinet or appliance.

A white cat walks on a tiled floor with visible water puddles, then bends down to lick water. An inset shows a close-up of its wet paw with black paw pads.
A person holds a white cat over a long, rectangular black electric fireplace with artificial orange and yellow flames. The cat looks hesitant and surprised.

A golden British Shorthair cat sits on the floor, looking directly at the camera with its mouth open, appearing to meow.

Three golden British Shorthair cats are sitting on individual light blue mats on a windowsill, looking out a wet window.

Seven cats (four golden British Shorthairs and three light-colored/white cats) are sitting in a row on separate mats on a windowsill, all looking out a window covered in condensation.
Close-up of three small kittens (two white, one golden) huddled together on fluffy, light-colored fur.
A golden British Shorthair adult cat is inside a wooden cat bed, grooming a white kitten, then looking up with large eyes.

A human hand gently pets the adult golden British Shorthair cat as it lies with the kittens inside the playpen.

Four golden British Shorthair cats (one adult, three kittens) are on a white rug outside a wooden playpen. The adult cat and one golden kitten are near the pen, while two white kittens observe, then look directly at the camera.

Two white kittens and one golden kitten eagerly lap milk from a yellow shallow bowl on the wooden floor. The golden kitten then quickly runs off.
An adult golden British Shorthair cat lies on a white rug, as a golden kitten attempts to nurse from it. The adult cat looks exasperated.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits on the floor, repeatedly pawing at the corner of a closed door, attempting to open it.

Two golden British Shorthair cats are near a dark closed door. One cat sits calmly, while the other stretches upward, pawing at the door. Several wooden toothpicks are jammed into the top of the doorframe.
A person's hand holds up a golden British Shorthair cat, positioning it upright against a dark door. The cat looks unhappy.
A person uses a power tool, possibly a grinder, to remove a door lock, creating a shower of sparks. The old lock is replaced with a sleek black smart lock.

Four golden British Shorthair cats sit on a mat in front of the dark door with the new lock, looking up intently. Their eyes are comically enlarged by a visual effect. One cat stands on its hind legs, stretching its paws towards the door.

A series of shots depict a busy travel environment: a large, crowded train station hall, a person pulling a white wheeled suitcase, and an exterior view of a train station building adorned with red lanterns.

Surveillance footage inside a bedroom shows four golden British Shorthair cats lounging on a bed. One cat sits upright, looking at the camera. Another scene from surveillance (in monochrome) shows a white cat on the bed, vigorously pawing at the sheets as if burying something.
A person opens a wooden bedroom door, revealing a bed with pink bedding inside.

Surveillance footage shows four cats (three golden British Shorthairs and one calico/black and white cat) gathered around multiple food bowls on the floor in a living area. They are actively eating. Surveillance footage from inside a bedroom shows a golden British Shorthair cat trapped, repeatedly scratching and meowing loudly at the closed door, attempting to open it.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits inside a large, empty blue and red foldable pet pool in a white room.
A person's hand holds a small bottle with a scoop of catnip over the cat in the pool, introducing the catnip.

Four golden British Shorthair cats are on a white couch. Three are snuggled together, appearing to groom each other, while one golden British Shorthair cat sits apart on the floor, looking up at them.

The blue and red foldable pet pool is now filled with water. A golden British Shorthair cat walks near its edge.

A person's hand pats one of the golden British Shorthair cats sitting in front of the pet dryer, while the cat inside can be seen looking out.
A golden British Shorthair cat is seen intensely licking or biting a person's arm.

The person is on a white couch looking at their phone, surrounded by five cats: three golden British Shorthairs on the couch, and a golden British Shorthair and a tabby cat on the floor. All are focused on the person.

A golden British Shorthair cat is in the pet dryer, looking out, while another golden British Shorthair cat on the floor looks at it.

One golden British Shorthair cat is being groomed on the couch by another, while three other golden British Shorthair cats sit on the floor, looking up at them.

Three golden British Shorthair cats are enthusiastically licking and sniffing the head of a fourth golden British Shorthair cat, who lies on a white blanket, looking somewhat overwhelmed.
Close-up of the golden British Shorthair cat's head, which has damp, spiky fur resembling a hedgehog.

The camera pulls back, revealing four golden British Shorthair cats sitting in a perfectly aligned row on a grey sofa behind the cake. All cats are focused on the cake. A white and brown cat is partially visible on the far left.

A human hand places a white security camera on a bedside table, followed by a shot of an empty bed with pink bedding.
Night vision footage shows a person sleeping on a bed under white covers. A white cat enters the frame, approaches the sleeping person, and appears to observe them.

Night vision footage shows a wide shot of the bed. Four white cats with glowing eyes are on the bed, surrounding the sleeping person and appearing to lick or bite their neck and face. The cats then all look towards the camera.

A person is holding a small, fluffy golden-colored kitten, likely a British Shorthair, with both hands. The kitten's tiny paws are visible, and it looks directly at the camera at first, then away as it's brought closer to the person's face. A cat tree is visible in the background.

A close-up shot of the same fluffy golden-colored kitten being held up. The kitten's mouth is wide open, as if it's loudly meowing or expressing distress. Its eyes are slightly squinted, conveying an exaggerated expression.

Four golden British Shorthair cats are arranged on a pink striped bed. Three cats are positioned close together, facing a laptop, while one cat sits slightly separated and appears isolated, facing away from the group.

Three golden British Shorthair cats are lined up, eating from individual bowls against a white wall. The fourth golden British Shorthair cat sits nearby, observing them with a forlorn look, indicating it has no bowl.
Three golden British Shorthair cats are seated in a row in front of a TV screen, seemingly engaged. The fourth golden British Shorthair cat is positioned behind them, looking neglected and left out.

The sad cat's face is shown with digitally enlarged, tearful eyes, emphasizing its distress.
The three-tiered cart with the three cats is shown again, with the fourth cat still on the floor, looking annoyed.

All four golden British Shorthair cats are now seen comfortably settled, one on each tier of the four-tiered cart, each with its own designated space.
The golden British Shorthair cat, seemingly the one who was previously excluded, is lying relaxed on the floor next to a tripod.
The scene transitions from the relaxed cat on the floor to the four-tiered cart, revealing a new cat – a white and brown Ragdoll – now occupying the top tier.

The four-tiered cart is shown with the Ragdoll on top and the three golden British Shorthair cats on the lower tiers. The golden British Shorthair cat that was resting is now on the floor again, looking distressed.
The camera first focuses on the occupied cart, then pans to the golden British Shorthair cat on the floor, who looks up at the cart with a sad, bewildered expression.

The cat's face is shown with digitally enlarged, sorrowful eyes, highlighting its profound disappointment.
Two golden British Shorthair cats are in front of tablets. One cat appears to be licking the screen with a white circular image, while the other looks at a screen displaying a food bowl.

Two golden British Shorthair cats sit side-by-side on a white mat, facing two tall, clear cylindrical tubes, each containing kibble at the bottom.

The cat tries to swat the kibble with its paw and then attempts to reach inside the tube with its mouth.
The cat observes the tube. A hand points to the bottom opening of the tube, and the cat then tries to lick the tube's side.
Three golden British Shorthair cats are gathered around the tube. One cat is licking the glass, while the other two observe.
Close-up of two golden British Shorthair cats watching, appearing puzzled.
The cat continues to lick the clear tube in an attempt to reach the kibble.
The cat lifts its head, meowing with a frustrated expression.

The cat attempts to push its head through the tube opening to reach the kibble.
The cat gets its head and front body stuck inside the tube, unable to move forward, with the kibble still at the far end.
Overhead view of the cat stuck in the tube, its body protruding, with its tail flicking.
Front view of the cat, still trapped in the tube, looking dejected.
The two golden British Shorthair cats are side-by-side, each persistently licking the glass of their respective tubes to get the unreachable kibble.

A mirrored view of a golden British Shorthair cat being held upright by a person's hands, standing on its hind legs. The cat's front paws are held by the person, while the cat looks directly forward in a hallway with wooden doors in the background.

Four golden British Shorthair cats are neatly lined up on a white sofa, attentively watching a person's hand. The hand first presents three large red envelopes, placing them in front of the first three cats. Subsequently, a much smaller, fourth red envelope is presented and placed in front of the last cat.

A top-down view shows the four cats and their respective red envelopes. The three larger envelopes each have a dried fish on top, while the smallest envelope in front of the fourth cat has a tiny key on it. The fourth cat looks at its envelope.

The scene focuses on the fourth cat and its small red envelope. The cat is watching the tiny key. A human hand gently taps the cat's paw, and the cat retracts it. The golden British Shorthair cat slowly approaches a partially open white door, looking cautious.

The golden British Shorthair cat peeks around the partially open door and freezes, seeing the person inside the bedroom wearing the inflated red and black dinosaur costume. The dinosaur stands tall, facing the cat.

A human hand gently nudges the cat towards the door frame, and the cat slowly squeezes through the narrow opening, disappearing behind it. The white tissue remains on the floor.

A computer screen in what appears to be a veterinary office displays an X-ray of a cat's abdomen, showing a large accumulation within its intestines. A black keyboard and a small pink sign are visible on the desk below the screen.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits on the desk in front of the computer screen, looking up at the viewer with wide, curious eyes and a slightly confused expression.
The golden British Shorthair cat is sitting on a gray bed, observing several small pink packaged items laid out in front of it. The cat then turns and quickly jumps off the bed.
The golden British Shorthair cat walks across a wooden floor, heading purposefully towards a white, dome-shaped automatic litter box in the distance.
The cat approaches and then enters the large, white, dome-shaped automatic litter box, which is decorated with colorful cartoon stickers.
The cat is inside the litter box, appearing to struggle as it attempts to relieve itself. A human hand holds up a smartphone displaying an app with an activity log, showing "5 minutes 24 seconds."
A human hand holds one of the small pink packaged items (a suppository or similar) towards the golden British Shorthair cat, who is still inside the litter box.

The golden British Shorthair cat is seen from a top-down view, lying on a wooden floor or table. A human hand gently touches and pulls its fluffy tail, while another hand holds the pink packaged item. The cat displays expressions of confusion, slight annoyance, and anxiety as its tail is manipulated.

The golden British Shorthair cat is on the wooden table, looking directly at the camera with comically exaggerated wide, surprised eyes. A human hand is still touching its tail, seemingly triggering this dramatic reaction.
The golden British Shorthair cat quickly rushes across the wooden floor and re-enters the white automatic litter box.
Inside the litter box, the golden British Shorthair cat is actively digging and covering the litter.
A human hand pulls out a side compartment from the automatic litter box, revealing a waste bag inside.
The golden British Shorthair cat is back inside the litter box, continuing to dig, then sits and looks at the camera with an intense expression, its eyes appearing to glow red.

Close-up of a golden British Shorthair cat lying on a grey and white checkered blanket or pillow, illuminated by sunlight. A human hand gently touches the fur near the cat's ear. The cat appears relaxed, looking calmly towards the right side of the frame.
Four golden British Shorthair cats are lying in a row on a light-colored rug, attentively watching a tablet that displays an image of a cat surrounded by autumn leaves.
A person's hand interacts with the tablet, scrolling through various images of cats amidst autumn foliage, while the four cats continue to observe with interest.
A person presents a red maple leaf to a golden British Shorthair cat, which attempts to playfully swat at it. Several red leaves are scattered on the wooden floor.
Various piles of dried autumn leaves, including red maple, yellowish ginkgo, and brown sycamore, are arranged on a wooden floor.
A person holds up a brown maple leaf with intricate cat faces etched into its surface, showcasing the detailed artistry to the observing cats.
A person holds a sculpture of a cat made entirely from yellow ginkgo leaves, while a golden British Shorthair cat sits nearby, tilting its head in curiosity.
A person cuts a hexagonal hole into a cardboard box, then proceeds to glue various autumn leaves around the opening. A golden British Shorthair cat watches the process.
A person gently wipes the face of a golden British Shorthair cat with a cotton pad.
A golden British Shorthair cat lies on its back on a white blanket, wearing a white sheet mask.
The person carefully removes the sheet mask from the cat's face, revealing its curious expression, and then attempts to reapply it.
The cat lies on the white blanket, looking annoyed, with the removed sheet mask lying beside it.
Three decorated cardboard boxes, each with a leaf-adorned opening, are set up on the floor. A golden British Shorthair cat sits in front of them, seemingly ready for a photoshoot.
A person gently places a cat into one of the cardboard boxes from above.
A person shines a flashlight into the opening of one of the cardboard boxes, creating a warm, orange glow inside.
A person films a cat peeking through the leaf-decorated hole of a cardboard box with a smartphone, while another hand offers the cat a treat.
The smartphone screen displays photos of various cats peeking through autumn leaves, some with warm lighting effects and others with natural light, showcasing the successful photoshoot.
Close-up shots of cats, including golden British Shorthairs and a tabby, are framed by various natural elements like autumn leaves and heart-shaped arrangements of red and yellow flowers.
A golden British Shorthair cat sits on a white surface, looking attentively at a tablet screen. The tablet displays a human holding a large, fluffy ginger cat.
The golden cat looks up from the tablet with a thoughtful, almost surprised expression.
A person's hand uses a grooming brush to brush the golden cat's back, collecting a significant amount of golden fur.
Four white open-top containers are shown, each filled to the brim with fluffy golden cat fur.
A person's hand gently strokes the golden cat's head. The cat is sitting on a white fluffy mat.
A person's hands rub together, seemingly to compress loose cat fur into a ball.
A person uses a needle felting tool to shape a small, round ball from golden cat fur, while the golden cat watches in the background.
A person needle-felts a grey fur ball. Two other cats, a Ragdoll and a Tabby, are seen sitting in the background, observing.

On a wooden floor and rug, various cat breeds (golden, Ragdoll, Tabby) are shown alongside fur balls of different sizes (small golden, medium grey, large white, and a very large golden ball) made from their fur, implying a comparison of their fluffiness.
Five cats are lined up on the wooden floor, facing a row of increasing larger fur balls on a rug. The largest golden fur ball appears almost as big as one of the golden cats.
A person offers the small golden fur ball to the golden cat, which playfully bats at it with its paw.
Two golden cats are seen closely together, one appearing to groom the other's head.
A person's hand attaches googly eyes to a small, round, golden fur ball. Several other similar fur balls are visible in a white tray.
Numerous small golden fur balls, each adorned with googly eyes, are neatly arranged in rows on a light-colored rug, resembling a little army of eye-balls.

The golden cat sits on the wooden floor, facing the large array of small fur balls with googly eyes on the rug. The cat appears to be looking at them with a slightly annoyed or disgruntled expression.
A transparent, elongated tube extends from an air conditioner, and a small, white cat is visible inside the tube as it moves along.

The camera follows the transparent tube as it stretches across the floor, passing a wooden table and continuing under a metal and wood staircase. A grey tabby cat is seen lying on its back next to the tube under the staircase.
The transparent tube leads to a multi-level white wire enclosure, where several golden British Shorthair cats are housed in different compartments, receiving airflow from the tube.

A golden British Shorthair cat is tucked under a white blanket in a bed, resting beside a smartphone. The cat repeatedly wakes up, looks intently at the phone, then closes its eyes and drifts back to sleep, only to be disturbed again. In the final moment, the cat wakes up, glances at the phone, and then pulls the blanket over its head in apparent annoyance.

An adult golden British Shorthair cat sits attentively next to a fluffy, white, flower-shaped pet bed. Inside the bed, a very small, golden British Shorthair kitten is actively vocalizing, mewing loudly at the adult cat.

A person wearing a large golden cat head mask and fluffy golden cat paw gloves kneels on a light wooden floor, facing three golden British Shorthair cats. Another golden British Shorthair cat is near the person's left, and a white Ragdoll cat is visible in the background on a yellow couch. The cats appear curious and watchful.

A hand holds up two pairs of knee-high socks patterned like cat paws and fur – one grey tabby and one orange tabby. In the background, a large, multi-tiered cat tree with brown and green platforms is visible.

Three golden British Shorthair cats sit side-by-side on the wooden floor, looking down intently at a person's feet, which are now clad in the orange tabby-patterned socks. The cats tilt their heads slightly, appearing confused.

A black and grey striped tabby cat (possibly an American Shorthair or British Shorthair) sits on the wooden floor, looking down at a person's feet, which are wearing the grey tabby-patterned socks. The cat then looks up at the camera with wide, surprised eyes.

The three golden British Shorthair cats are again sitting in a line on the wooden floor. A hand holds two ultrasound images, showing what appear to be cat fetuses, in front of the cats. The cats look at the images with perplexed expressions.

A person sits on a checkered cushion on the floor, holding and patting a very large, round "pregnant" belly (likely a prop or pillow). The three golden British Shorthair cats are in front of the person, looking at the belly with expressions of disbelief and confusion.

Two golden British Shorthair cats are eating kibble from light blue, fish-shaped bowls on the wooden floor. A person kneels beside them and picks up some kibble, pretending to eat it from their hand. The cats stop eating and stare at the person with wide-eyed shock and apparent disgust.

A golden British Shorthair cat is lying on a white round table. A hand gently strokes the cat's head. The hand then presents a smartphone displaying a "pet affinity test" application, showing a "99% affinity" result. The cat looks intently at the phone screen, then turns its head to gaze directly at the camera with very large, surprised eyes.

A golden British Shorthair cat sits on a white round table. A hand holds up a small clump of golden cat fur, which appears to have been brushed or pulled from the cat. The cat looks up at the hand, then closes its eyes as if annoyed or displeased.

A golden British Shorthair cat walks onto a light beige rug and rubs its face affectionately against a person's hand. The cat then rolls onto its back, purring, showing extreme closeness and attachment to the person.
A golden British Shorthair cat walks across the light beige rug, then lies down and turns its head to look directly at the camera with wide, innocent, and curious eyes.

A top-down shot of various small, realistic cat-shaped felted figures, appearing to be crafted from fur. The camera then pans up to reveal four real golden British Shorthair cats sitting neatly behind the felted figures, which resemble them.
Two large, fluffy cats, one white and brown Ragdoll and one grey tabby American Shorthair, are sitting attentively on a light wooden floor.
The four golden British Shorthair cats are again shown sitting in a line, with the smaller felted figures in front of them, looking at the camera.
A close-up of the Ragdoll cat sitting on the wooden floor. It yawns and stretches its mouth open, then closes it with its tongue slightly out.
A close-up of a homemade cat grooming device: a cardboard box with multiple brushes glued to its inner walls, forming a tunnel.
The Ragdoll cat, seen from behind, enters and passes through the brush-lined cardboard box, emerging from the other side.

The brush-lined box is shown with large clumps of light-colored fur stuck to the brushes inside. A human hand then reaches in and pulls out a large, fluffy ball of white cat fur. One of the golden British Shorthair cats sits next to the box, observing the scene with a curious look.
The Ragdoll and grey tabby cats are lying relaxed on a white surface. A human hand holds up a small, intricate wire frame, shaped like a cat's skeleton.
Close-up of hands using a needle-felting tool to attach white fur to a small, cat-shaped form. The real Ragdoll cat is partially visible in the background.

Close-up of hands meticulously needle-felting brown and white patterns onto the small Ragdoll cat figure, replicating the real cat's markings. The real Ragdoll cat is visible in the foreground.

A hand holds the tiny felted Ragdoll cat figure next to the real Ragdoll cat, emphasizing the size difference. Three golden British Shorthair cats are visible in the background, watching.
